strapiPost.title: Springdale Florist Designed Sarah Huckabee Sanders' Inaugural Ball
strapiPost.content:
Glenn Schnetzinger, owner of Organic Creations in Springdale, was chosen to design the floral decorations for Governor-elect Sarah Huckabee Sanders' inauguration.

  • Blossoming: Schnetzinger is one of the few designers in Arkansas to be inducted into the American Institute of Floral Design, studied under the prestigious Gregor Lersch, and has been featured in the Dallas Museum of Art, Crystal Bridges, and numerous design publications.
  • Famous flowers: Designing Governor-elect Sanders' inauguration adds to Schnetzinger's repertoire of renowned events, having been part of design teams for four Academy Awards ceremonies and President Bush's inauguration in 2001.

Read more on the story HERE.
